original_text: Be very careful! Some people are teaching bad things. They say that you must cut your bodies. They are like dangerous dogs. Do not believe them!
korean_text: 개들을 삼가고 행악하는 자들을 삼가고 몸을 상해하는 일을 삼가라

sentences.original_text: Some people are teaching bad things.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 나쁜 것들을 가르치고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: They say that you must cut your bodies.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신이 몸을 잘라야 한다고 말합니다.
